Saulo Sarmiento (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1987) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agba egwú na Canary Islands
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Cirque du Soleil ma pụta na ihe ngosi Britain's Got Talent nakwa La France a un incroyable talent.  Ọ malitere ọzụzụ mmega ahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ.
Sarmiento na-asụ Bekee, Spanish, na French. N'ihe gbasara ahụike, Sarmiento gwara Queerty na ọ naghị eri nri nke ukwuu tupu ọ hie ụra ma na-agwakọtakwa usoro obi na ihe dị arọ na klas yoga.
